faq_subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services
faq1_question: How long does it take to create a website?
faq1_answer: Depending on the package, the website is ready in 5-14 working days from contract signing and receiving all necessary materials.
faq2_question: Can I change the content on the website?
faq2_answer: Yes, we provide brief training on how to change basic content. For more complex changes, we're here to help.
faq3_answer: Payment is possible in two installments: 50% upfront and 50% upon completion. We accept cash, bank transfer and cards.
faq4_question: What happens to the domain after one year?
faq4_answer: The domain becomes your property. We send you renewal information one month before expiration.
faq5_answer: Yes, the first three months are free for minor changes and technical support. After that we offer monthly maintenance packages.
faq6_question: Can I get a website in multiple languages?
faq6_answer: We provide Bosnian and English as standard. For additional languages we can negotiate price depending on complexity.
